sentence: Hamas spokesman to deliver response to state of the union.https://twitter.com/hollyotterbein/status/1496455601416814598\u00a0\u2026 — Josh Mandel (@Josh Mandel) 1645658514 Twitter was jolted into condemning Mandel's unprovoked post for being baselessly and unabashedly racist.
author: Brandon Gage
title: Josh Mandel tweets racist trope about Rashida Tlaib

sentence: If Your Time is short Not a scrap of evidence has emerged to support Josh Mandel’s assertion of a stolen election.
author: Jon Greenberg
title: Ohio’s Josh Mandel repeats false claim of stolen 2020 election

sentence: Republican candidate for the U.S. Senate in Ohio, Josh Mandel, pulled no punches during an interview with RSBN’s Brian Glenn at CPAC Friday, boldly stating, “I believe this election was stolen from Donald J. Trump.” He added, “I’m the only candidate in the race for U.S. Senate who’s been calling for an audit in Pennsylvania, Wisconsin, Michigan, Georgia, and everywhere we roam.” Mandel, who recently completed two terms as Ohio’s treasurer, is also an eight-year veteran of the United States Marine Corps.
author: Summer Lane
title: Josh Mandel swings at election fraud: ‘I believe this election was stolen’
